contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Launching a website with Xperience by Kentico: First Impressions
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Dragoljub Ilic, software developer from Kentico partner Exlrt, reflects on what it was like to ship a Kentico Site of the Month winning Xperience by Kentico project to production. To quote Dragoljub, "it’s not the Kentico we knew. It’s a completely new Xperience, and it’s truly impressive!"
